name: Crackshot
description: Get out there and... crack some nuts.

heroPerk.name: Mad Tidings
heroPerk.description: Firing a ranged weapon grants <Number>1</> stack of <Keyword>Holiday Spirit</>, up to <Number>50 stacks</>. Each stack of <Keyword>Holiday Spirit</> increases <ModifiedAttribute>Ranged Weapon Damage</> by <Number>101%</> but decreases <ModifiedAttribute>Weapon Stability</> by <Number>100%</>. Buff removed on weapon swap or reload.

commanderPerk.name: Mad Tidings +
commanderPerk.description: Firing a ranged weapon grants <Number>1</> stack of <Keyword>Holiday Spirit</>, up to <Number>50 stacks</>. Each stack of <Keyword>Holiday Spirit</> increases <ModifiedAttribute>Ranged Weapon Damage</> by <Number>203%</> but decreases <ModifiedAttribute>Weapon Stability</> by <Number>199%</>. Buff removed on weapon swap or reload.

recruitment.sourceText: Earned through the "Holly Jolly Ransom" questline.
